messages.msgSnippet: this is why we homeschool. My house doesn t look like a picture out of House and Garden. Projects are all over the house. We have mud on the front door and the
messages.messageBody:
this is why we homeschool. My house doesn't look like a picture out of House
and Garden. Projects are all over the house. We have mud on the front door
and the wonderful sound of sqeals of delight and laughter punctuating many
conversations. Our children are only children once. Don't deny them that
wonderful opportunity. Of course there are always grandkids!
Johanna

Yes, this is why I sent the poem, because children are only young once,
and I am grateful for the opportunity to recognize that dirt and chips stuck
in between the couch pillows are a once in a lifetime of my 3 children.
Its also why I love HS, and treasure the thought of unschooling.


Linda
